function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in indoor settings","Impact":"Increased risk of TB transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Improve ventilation systems or implement alternative technologies such as upper-room UV fixtures or negative air ionization","Technologies":"Upper-room UV fixtures, negative air ionization","People":"Individuals in indoor congregate settings, healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Facility managers, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in congregate settings","Impact":"Increased risk of TB transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement measures to reduce overcrowding or enhance environmental control measures","Technologies":"Environmental control measures, facility design improvements","People":"Individuals in congregate settings, healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Facility managers, healthcare administrators"},{"Description":"Lack of respiratory isolation facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of TB transmission and spread of contagious diseases in emergency departments and waiting rooms","Mitigation":"Develop and implement respiratory isolation facilities or alternative infection control strategies such as negative air ionization","Technologies":"Respiratory isolation facilities, negative air ionization","People":"Healthcare workers, patients in emergency departments and waiting rooms","Owner":"Healthcare administrators"}]}
